snippet: The San Francisco Drug Users’ Union is one of several groups in the United States and Canada that seek to represent the political interests — and practical needs — of drug abusers.
abstract: San Francisco Drug Users' Union is one of several groups in the United States and Canada that seeks to represent the political interests--and practical needs--of chronic drug abusers; organization is largely run by former and current drug users, who provide clean needles and a safe place for users to get high, as well as pursuing more ambitious goals like lobbying for better health service.
lead_paragraph: The San Francisco Drug Users’ Union is one of several groups in the United States and Canada that seek to represent the political interests — and practical needs — of drug abusers.

headline.seo: Drug Users’ Union in San Francisco Seeks Voice in Policy
